description: The royal palace of the Arabasta Kingdom in the capital city of Alubarna, home to the Nefertari family.

keyEvents.title: Nami vs Miss Doublefinger Battle
keyEvents.description: Nami battles Miss Doublefinger inside the palace while learning to use the Clima-Tact.
keyEvents.significance: The setting for Nami's first major solo battle and the debut of her signature weapon.

keyEvents.title: Pluton Interrogation
keyEvents.description: Crocodile interrogates King Cobra about the ancient weapon Pluton in the palace.
keyEvents.significance: First mention of Pluton and revelation of Crocodile's true goal.

keyEvents.title: Bomb Plot Revealed
keyEvents.description: Crocodile reveals his plan to bomb Palace Square at 4:30.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the crisis threatening to kill thousands in Alubarna.
